<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Smoldering Explosion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3388) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 124</row>

**Archetype** [Spell Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=126)

**Prerequisites**
[Spell Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3368); ability to cast [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119)

</column>

---

When you cast _fireball_ heightened to at least 4th level, you can modify the spell to add the following to its standard effects: Your _fireball_ leaves behind a brief cloud of smoke in its area. While it's smoke instead of mist, this cloud otherwise has the effects of [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210), except that it lasts only 1 round.

<title level="2">Smoldering Explosion leads to...</title>
[Choking Smoke](/Feats.aspx?ID=3392)
name: Smoldering Explosion
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _fireball_
